title: Voice-App — Voice-Driven LLM Interaction Layer
description: Real-time voice interface for conversational AI using ElevenLabs TTS and continuous speech recognition.
highlights: Real-time voice interface for conversational AI using ElevenLabs TTS and continuous speech recognition.
Demonstrates event-driven audio streaming, multilingual prompts, and AI-assisted UX design and TTS/STT/TTV.

title: AI Coding Tutor — Interactive AI-Powered Coding Challenge System
description: Adaptive coding tutor that uses Claude API to provide guided debugging, explanations, and contextual assistance.
highlights: Adaptive coding tutor that uses Claude API to provide guided debugging, explanations, and contextual assistance.
Features modular challenge workflows, scoring, and a chat interface driven by code-aware reasoning.

title: TokuWebDev LMS — Full-Stack LMS with AI Roadmaps
description: Full-stack LMS that uses Claude and HuggingFace models to generate personalized learning roadmaps and tasks.
highlights: Full-stack LMS that uses Claude and HuggingFace models to generate personalized learning roadmaps and tasks.
Includes course management, progress tracking, and AI-assisted review in a modular scalable architecture.

title: AI Flashcard App — Adaptive AI Study & Memory Reinforcement
description: AI-powered flashcard system that generates study content dynamically and reinforces retention with spaced repetition.
highlights: AI-powered flashcard system that generates study content dynamically and reinforces retention with spaced repetition.
Supports multilingual learning and showcases AI-driven personalization and modern full-stack design.
